The witches of Iblydos are known for greeting travelers with warmth only to reveal their powers once their enemies have lowered their defenses.

A witch can use this hex to gain the benefits of @Compendium[pf1.spells.7c8nufdm0pj4bgep]{Glibness} with a caster level equal to the witchâ€™s level. This hex can be used once per day.
